title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer: LLM, chat, embedding, and tool-calling wrappers around Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support, model management, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper written in Go that adds chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + LangChain for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private LLM conversations in workspaces.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP, streaming, and native JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET REST client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes or generate text using local models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio & serde.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with conversation history and model switcher.

title: ollama-gradle-plugin
summary: Gradle plugin to download and cache Ollama models at build time for JVM integration tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
